2.0.name: wordpress/joomood-wp-se-new-users
2.0.description:
This plugin/widget will display your Newest Social Engine Users on your Wordpress blog. You may customize a lot of features, such as:

  • the total number of new users
  • the total number of new users per-line
  • the date format
  • a lot of style preferences like: colours, borders, pic dimensions a.s.o.

The widget and the plugin have separate configurations.
